# Verify that we receive initial diagnostics for files that
# have compile errors but not for those that don't. Then
# when we open any file we receive diagnostics for that file

[short] skip 'Skip because we sleep for GOVIM_ERRLOGMATCH_WAIT to verify we haven''t received diagnostics'

sleep $GOVIM_ERRLOGMATCH_WAIT
errlogmatch -count=1 -start 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/main.go
errlogmatch -count=0 -start 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/other.go

vim ex 'e main.go'
errlogmatch 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/main.go

vim ex 'e other.go'
errlogmatch 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/other.go

errlogmatch -count=2 -start 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/main.go
errlogmatch -count=1 -start 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/other.go

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

go 1.12
-- main.go --
package main

blah
-- other.go --
package main
